name: Cocoa grab scrolling
body:
This project was developed by Matt Gemmel :

http://mattgemmell.com/source/

It Shows how to implement grab-scrolling in cocoa, like in Preview, Photoshop, Acrobat and more. Includes the two requisite hand-cursors.

I just refactored it in a Xcode 6 project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
